data.message: i have been trying to get a hold of facebook for hours  can someone contact me back please

replies.message: Hey Caleb. Can you tell us more about what you're experiencing? -Kiara

I sent it all in messenger. My account was hacked. Password changed. And I don't have access to my email from 12 years ago, however I can provide any all information you need. Please help. That page has ALL of the photos of my 3 year old boy and everything for the past 10 or more years

Thanks for following up, Caleb. We're sorry you're experiencing this. If your account has been taken over by someone else, you can secure it here: on.fb.me/XqYbih. If you're still having trouble, you can recover an account you can't log into by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2jy21qQ. -Kiara
It takes me to a page that I have to ask friends for help. But can't ask them because I don't have their numbers and they are scattered throughout the country...  I NEED ACCESS TO MY ACCOUNT
who can help me  please i beg you
So no?  So photos of my kids whole life.... just gone. That is facebook
Hi Caleb. If you're still having trouble recovering your hacked account, here are some additional things to try: http://bit.ly/2iXZvWJ. -Kiara
No that's no help. Can someone just please message me

I can't log into my password because someone changed it.....  and I don't have access to my email for my old profile. It's a very old email. Can someone please message me or email me. Calebgill1989@gmail.com
